question: What can you help me with?
answer: I can help you with any question related to the app! Ask me something below 👇

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click the login button on the top-right, then choose 'Create New Account' from the popup modal and fill in your email,name and password.

question: I can't login
answer: Click the login button at the top-right and enter your credentials. If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password' to reset it.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click the login button, then click ‘Forgot Password?’ in the login modal to receive a reset link via email.

question: How to edit my profile?
answer: Click on your profile picture in the top-right and select 'Edit Profile' to update your details.

question: Do you deliver on Sundays?
answer: Yes! We deliver every day, including Sundays, between 8 AM and 10 PM.

question: When do you deliver?
answer: Our delivery hours are from 8 AM to 10 PM daily, including weekends.

question: What areas do you deliver to?
answer: We deliver to all major cities and towns in texas.

question: Where can I add my address?
answer: You can add your delivery address during checkout or directly at: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address

question: Can I change my address?
answer: Yes! You can change your address during checkout or at https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address

question: How can I pay?
answer: We support secure online payments via Stripe and cash on delivery (COD).

question: Is online payment secure?
answer: Absolutely. We use Stripe for secure transactions and do not store your payment details.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: Packaged items can be returned within 30 days. Please contact support with your order number to start the process.

question: What items can I return?
answer: You can return unused packaged items in their original packaging within 30 days of delivery.

question: Can I return fresh fruits or vegetables?
answer: No, fresh produce like fruits and vegetables cannot be returned due to their perishable nature.

question: Can I cancel my order?
answer: Cancelling orders isn't available via app. Please contact support at support@zestygroceries.com for help.

question: How do I get a refund?
answer: Once we receive your returned item, your refund will be processed within 5–7 business days.

question: How can I subscribe to offers?
answer: Scroll to the bottom of our homepage and fill out the newsletter form: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app. You’ll get updates and deals in your inbox!

question: How do I unsubscribe from newsletter?
answer: Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any email you received from us.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can email us at support@zestygroceries.com or call +1 (234) 567-8901 (Mon–Sat, 9 AM–8 PM).

question: Is customer service available on weekends?
answer: Customer service is available Monday to Saturday from 9 AM to 8 PM. Sunday is closed.

question: Where can I find top discounts?
answer: Visit the 'Top Discounts' section on the homepage or go to: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#topDiscounts

question: Where are best sellers shown?
answer: You’ll find them in the 'Best Sellers' section of the homepage or visit: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#bestsellers

question: What categories do you have?
answer: We offer Organic Veggies, Fresh Fruits, Drinks, Instant Foods, Dairy, Bakery, and Grains & Cereals. See all at https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products

question: What is Zesty known for?
answer: We’re known for lightning-fast delivery, unbeatable freshness, and affordable prices. Trusted by over 10,000 happy customers!

question: What makes Zesty different?
answer: Zesty offers 30-minute delivery, farm-fresh products, great prices, and a user-friendly shopping experience.

question: Where can I view my order history?
answer: You can view your past and current orders on the My Orders page: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/my-orders

question: How do I track my order status?
answer: Go to the My Orders section here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/my-orders to check your order status.

question: How do I go back to the homepage?
answer: You can visit the Zesty homepage using this link: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/

question: Where can I browse all available products?
answer: Visit the All Products page to explore our full catalog: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products

question: How do I contact the support team?
answer: You can reach out to our support team through the Contact page: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/contact

question: Where can I find the return and refund policy?
answer: Our return and refund policy is available here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/return-refund-policy

question: How do I view the FAQ section?
answer: You can view our frequently asked questions here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/faq

question: Where can I find vegetables?
answer: Visit our Vegetables category here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/vegetables

question: Where are the fruits listed?
answer: You can browse our Fruits collection here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/fruits

question: Where can I buy drinks?
answer: Explore our Drinks category here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/drinks

question: Do you have instant or fast food options?
answer: Yes, check our Instant Food section here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/instant

question: Where are dairy products available?
answer: All dairy items can be found here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/dairy

question: Where can I buy bakery items?
answer: Visit our Bakery section here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/bakery

question: Where can I find grains and cereals?
answer: Check the Grains and Cereals category here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products/grains

question: Where can I find the best selling products?
answer: You can check out our Best Sellers section here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#bestsellers

question: Where can I see top discounted products?
answer: Check our Top Discounts here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#topDiscounts

question: How do I view my shopping cart?
answer: Go to your Cart page here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/cart

question: How do I add a new delivery address?
answer: You can add your address here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address

question: How do I edit my profile information?
answer: You can update your profile details here: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/edit-profile

question: Where do I go to update my delivery address?
answer: Update your delivery information at: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address
